product_description: If it weren't so pretty, you might never even notice you had this longline lace bralette on.
product_details_and_care:
If it weren't so pretty, you might never even notice you had this longline lace bralette on. Scalloped-edge triangular cups bring scintillating shape, and a wide, sports-inspired band levels up the support.
Mesh-lined cups
88% nylon, 12% spandex
Hand wash, line dry
Imported
Item #5890779
